para.text: Same day registration is available during early voting and election day for the following regularly scheduled elections:
Presidential primary and general elections; and
Same day address change is available during early voting for the following regularly scheduled elections:
Presidential primary and general elections; and
For special primary and general elections:
Same day registration is available on election day; and
Same day registration and address change is available during early voting if the special election is conducted by mail under Election Law Article, Title 9, Subtitle 5, Annotated Code of Maryland.

section.heading: Prohibited Changes.
section.text: Same day party affiliation changes are not permitted during early voting or on election day.
